name: nekcem

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Spectral-element solver for Maxwell's equations, drift-diffusion
equations, and more.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI. This package has been replaced by intel-oneapi-mpi. LICENSE
INFORMATION: By downloading and using this software, you agree to the
terms and conditions of the software license agreements at
https://intel.ly/393CijO.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description:
libflame is a portable library for dense matrix computations, providing
much of the functionality present in LAPACK, developed by current and
former members of the Science of High-Performance Computing (SHPC) group
in the Institute for Computational Engineering and Sciences at The
University of Texas at Austin. libflame includes a compatibility layer,
lapack2flame, which includes a complete LAPACK implementation.

dependent_to.name: ceed
dependent_to.description:
Ceed is a collection of benchmarks, miniapps, software libraries and
APIs for efficient high-order finite element and spectral element
discretizations for exascale applications developed in the Department of
Energy (DOE) and partially supported by the Exascale Computing Project
(ECP). This is a Spack bundle package that installs the CEED software
components.
